I bought this product based on the reviews and it arrived home and i was
satisfied. However my satisfactory feeling did not last for long. One of the
jar's sides has broken and the jar has come to a position where i cannot close
it or use it. When i took this to the preethi showroom nearby for replacing
they are taking too long to respond. Will it be possible for me to get a new
jar instead of the old one?

review:
Didn't even manage to make onion paste. Returning the product.

Its a good product so far in last 3-4 days. Lesser sound and the best part is
it doesn't shakes on full power as well. Yet to see the use of bigger jar and
the juicer. Overall satisfied.

Overall item is good but not happy with performance of mini jar which is
required mostly. It is having uneven surface at closing lead and due to that
it leaks.

Jars are so tight, removing from mixer is so difficult. Also medium sized jar
has been cracked after 1month of use.  
Even jar edges started rusting. See the pic

This is either a fake product or a product with cheap quality. I bought this
in October 2016 and within 3 months, a steel jar developed a crack and is
broken fully now. Do not go for this.

It's really Worth the money every one should check it out before buying any
other brand , it's good for regular use

To noisy & Bottom of all jar aluminium housing getting rusted Even blade also
rusting

Bought this for my mother and based on her experience with it for several
weeks now :  
\- she loves the juicer because it works great to extract coconut milk  
\- likes how "quite" it is when it runs  
\- does not think chutney jar grinds coconut chutney as well as her old jar.
It still has big chunks of coconut in it.  
Overall, she is pleased.

It has been two months, the medium jar is not grinding properly and also its
making more sound.

Preethi blue leaf is a excellent mixer grinder with a lot of power. The
quality of jars and the main unit is very good too. Overall product is good.
